summary:
20+ experienced professional in Digital Transformation using AI/Analytics. Career spanning multiple roles - Consultative Sales, Account Management, Business Development, Pre-sales/GTM, Marketing and Delivery. Outcome and client focused with high levels of personal drive with aptitude and interest in building longer term relationships and partnerships, and a strong personal network. 
Proven ability to consult with clients on larger transformation programs. Strengths in handling intrapreneurial and unstructured environments & complex, enterprise initiatives with multiple stakeholders.
Consistent self-starter with sustained success in incubating new engagements, & delivering value through continuous improvement & innovation.

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for sales and business development of the portfolio in Europe, with special focus on Data and Analytics services and solutions.
SG Analytics is a leading provider of analytics, insights and data-centric research services globally to companies across BFSI, Media & Entertainment, Manufacturing, Technology & Healthcare sectors including Fortune 500 companies.
profile_positions.title: Vice President, Sales & Growth

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for expanding BRIDGEi2i footprint in EU - helping global majors on their digital journeys, creating consultative transformative programs to realize benefits from advanced analytics and AI/ML/deep learning techniques. 
We bridge the gap between information and insight; using our asset-based consulting and scalable capabilities, focusing on last mile consumption and actionable insights.
profile_positions.title: Director, Sales and Account Management

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for client and key account management and growth in Mumbai, across verticals. Played a key role in relationship building and consulting for several large digital programs.
BRIDGEi2i is an exciting, fast-growing company, bringing Data Engineering, Advanced Analytics, proprietary AI accelerators and Consulting expertise to drive business actions for digital enterprises. Our AI accelerators simplify and democratize consumption of insights and recommend the right business actions, enabling faster and more accurate decision making across the enterprise.
profile_positions.title: Customer Advocate

profile_positions.description: Providing Go-To-Market (GTM) services to priority accounts across Analytics offerings and deal stages. This involves liaising with multiple business units in sales, delivery and offering functions to create go-to market strategies for accounts / verticals to generate pipeline through end-to-end GTM services. These include lead generation, mining, bid management, research, knowledge management, graphical enhancements, reporting, and storyboarding.
profile_positions.title: Assistant Vice President

profile_positions.description: Responsible for facilitating support for RFP/RFI responses, carrying out strategic assessments for off shoring, creating a process for and maintaining marketing collateral from different functions and verticals, creating and maintaining customized client visit dossiers, tracking marketing activity and providing marketing/research support to product initiatives.
profile_positions.title: Senior Manager

profile_positions.description:
A) Responsible for assessing off shoring opportunities/needs within businesses, creating final proposal and solution design
Achievements:
•Delivered successfully on 3 strategic assessments across Capital Market, Analytics and Research groups, from stakeholder discussions to final proposal design
•Using the Wachovia transition methodology, successfully created a new team of 6 analysts to support Supplier Research

B) Responsible for leading the Marketing Analytics team of 14 for Card Payment Services, providing support across decision sciences, business insights, campaign management and reporting
Achievements: 
•Provided management rigor and stability to the existing team of 5, in the face of lack of client credibility and challenges with skill sets and technology
•Hired and re-structured the team from 5 to 14 in 2 months, to suit the functional needs of the business
•Initiated and drove the design validation of a new technology platform to enable analysts to access US data
profile_positions.title: Sr Manager

profile_positions.description:
Led the marketing team of 2 analysts for Australia & New Zealand, responsible for providing support to the Direct Marketing and Market Intelligence functions, helping the business generate leads, build and process campaign strategy.
Achievements: 
•	Designed & structured the campaign process establishing SOPs, process rigor and audit controls. 
•	Led projects on database analytics, lead quality, lead priotization, look alike models, new process design, business & industry research.
profile_positions.title: Manager

profile_positions.description:
Lead the Campaign Management and Operations team of 4 analysts supporting the Direct Marketing team in execution of all strategies accurately, on time and cost-effectively, with focus on campaign execution.
Achievements: 
•	Created / presented the Genpact Campaign Operations (COPS) RFP (Request for Proposal) response to an external client as a COPS subject matter expert.
•	Conceptualized and presented the Genworth data processing RFP evaluation across vendors as a part of the business ‘new vendor selection’ process.
•	Drove projects on: Automation of COPS tool in SAS reducing rework by 90%, transition of COPS tool from SAS to UNICA, new process design on alternative channels like telemarketing, staggered mailing & re-engineering addressability data provided by vendor.
•	Six-sigma Green Belt certified in streamlining the campaign process, achieving 30% decrease in cycle time & 50% increase in productivity. Received annual GE productivity award for the same.
profile_positions.title: Assistant Manager

profile_positions.description: Key player in transitioning and setting up campaign management processes for a leading global insurer.
profile_positions.title: Business Analyst

volunteer_experiences.description: Volunteer teacher for pre-primary children in English and Math concepts
